articles.author: Caroline McCarthy
articles.title: Pope Francis denies Europe's migrant emergency, calls out countries' 'alarmist propaganda' - New York Post
articles.description: Pope Francis is challenging French President Emmanuel Macron and other European leaders to open their ports to people fleeing hardship and poverty.
articles.content: Pope Francis challenged French President Emmanuel Macron and other European leaders to open their ports to people fleeing hardship and poverty, insisting Saturday that the continent isn’t facing a mi… [+7739 chars]

articles.title: Day and night split in half today, satellite pic of Earth released | 'Incredible,' an X user commented on the pic | Inshorts - Inshorts
articles.description: The European Space Agency (ESA) took to X to share a satellite picture of Earth that was taken a 1.30 pm (IST)
